components.content:
Thank you for taking part. We’d like you to look at a prototype service we’re working on. You can use it in exactly the same way and for the same reasons you would use the real service.

We’d like to know about your experience as you use the prototype. You can tell us using the feedback button you’ll see halfway up the right hand edge of the screen.

What makes your experience good, or not so good? What frustrates you? What’s missing? How does it make you feel? Be candid - the more honest you are, the more we’ll understand what the service needs to look like and what it needs to do.

Everything we learn will be used to streamline the design and improve the usability of the service.

Select ‘Start now’ to use the prototype.
Start now
This prototype uses real data to present a picture of what’s going on in any area you select.
By proceeding you are consenting to our use of cookies. These are small files we place onto your computer to collect information about how you browse the service.
Find out more about cookies on GOV.UK and how to manage cookies. You can also learn more about how we use cookies and related technologies by reading our privacy policy.
It’s important that we learn more about your experience using this prototype. You can contact us by emailing floodresearch@environment-agency.gov.uk.
You can also leave comments using the feedback button located halfway up the right hand edge of any page you view..

Link to the live service

View the live flood information service.

Stuff we’re working on

View our roadmap here.

pages.title: Floods information service winter user research project
